title: Telecommuting Didn't Work Out For One Transplanted Worker
teaser: All summer, we're talking with out-of-work young adults about how they're making ends meet. Chrystina Gastlelum, 32, moved to Maine from New York City and tried to keep doing her job remotely.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
